features.title: Performance improvements
features.description: Performance improvement within the CMS, rather than within specific applications.

features.title: Non-blocking sessions
features.description: Replaces blocking sessions and allows multiple concurrent requests to be completed for the same person in the same browser.

features.title: Last saved
features.description: Allows editors to view how recently a page being edited has been saved, reminding them to save their in progress work.

features.title: Duplicate blocks
features.description: Duplicate existing blocks and move these to different pages.

features.title: In-CMS accessibility improvements
features.description: Determine and deliver a valuable set of accessibility improvements to the CMS itself.

features.title: In-CMS user support documentation
features.description: In-CMS user documentation to help customers understand what's available and how to make it work.
